ruling: - The cards sent to the Graveyard after the activation of [[Full Salvo]] are sent to the Graveyard by the effect of [[Full Salvo]]. They are not a cost. So they are sent when [[Full Salvo]] resolves, not when it is activated.
- If you send a "Dark World" monster to the Graveyard for the effect of [[Full Salvo]], its effects do not activate because it was not discarded.
